casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brian Frank GONZALES. No. 339PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 30, 2004. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, John Carriker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of August 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Gonzales) shall have up to and including the 27th day of September 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of August 2004."
